response.overview: Transmigration of the soul is a much-repeated truth; what if the soul becomes a ghost and a curse falls upon the family of the departed? ‘Black Kalash’ unveils why Narayan Bali Puja is performed when Narayan Bali Puja should be performed. It is now a rare ritual performed for untimely deaths. Narayan Bali Puja should be done by the nearest ones to the person who departed untimely, that is, Akal Mrityu.The ritual is performed at the Vimal Teerth of Pishach Mochan.
response.tagline: Death is reality, but is it the ultimate reality? Is it the end or beginning of a new journey?
response.title: BLACK KALASH
